method.name: get_ticks
method.description: Return amounts of ticks to display on slider.

method.name: get_ticks_on_borders
method.description: Return true if ticks are visible on borders.

method.name: set_ticks
method.description: Set amount of ticks to display in slider.

method.name: set_ticks_on_borders
method.description: Set true if ticks are visible on borders.
